dev.eternalformula.api.ecs.entities

Class MapEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity
      • dev.eternalformula.api.ecs.entities.MapEntity

  • public class MapEntity
extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity
    The MapEntity class represents the MapObjects that exist in Tiled maps.
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.2

      • copy

        public MapEntity copy(GameWorld world,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position)
        Copies a MapEntity to a new position in the world.
        Parameters:
        world - The GameWorld in use
        position - The desired position
        Returns:
        An exact copy of this MapEntity, with the position set to the desired position.
